tasks_description: I help businesses enhance their efficiency and digital presence through innovative technological solutions. I specialize in developing custom projects that combine attractive design with robust functionality, ensuring effective and high-quality results.
Mejoro eficiencia y presencia digital de negocios a través de soluciones tecnológicas innovadoras y robustas, garantizando resultados efectivos y de alta calidad.
General tasks: Mise en place for the corresponding shift, customer service, sales and customer assistance.
Tareas generales: Mise an place para el turno correspondiente, atención al cliente, venta y asistencia al cliente.
